title: Black Small Square

adjectives: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A very small square shaded completely black. Notably smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square, ◼️ Black Medium Square, and the ◾ Black Medium-Small Square.
apple_vendor_description: Apple’s black small square emoji is a perfectly formed, minimalist geometric shape, rendered with a deep, matte black finish that absorbs light, emphasizing its clean, sharp edges. On Apple devices, it maintains a subtle 3D presence with a hint of depth, ensuring it stands out clearly against any background. This versatile emoji is often employed for organizational purposes, to mark divisions in text, or to add a touch of understated visual structure to digital content.
